regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)class="competition".*?title="Buffstreams([^"]*)"\s*href="([^"]*).*?score">\s*([^<]*)\n.', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('[makelist.param2]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) #z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyw(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreamer' not in i[0]] #sort1 = [(client.tinyw(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z ] return sort #+ sort1

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re r = re.findall('(?s)<div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6">\s*<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*).*?name">([^<]*).*?ore">([^<]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests e = re.findall('var streamsMatchId\s*=\s*([^;]*)',page_data)[0] r = re.findall('var streamsSport\s*=\s*"([^;"]*)',page_data)[0] t = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/streams-table/' + e + '/' + r + '?new-ui=1&origin=reddit.nbabite.com', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyu(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'Platinum' in i[2] if 'Weak_Spell' in i[1]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return e = re.findall('(?s)<div class="ctpage"><a href="([^"]*).*?ing">([^<]*).*?p>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace('\xc5\x82',' ').replace('&',' ').replace('#',' ').replace('8211',' ').replace(',',' '),i[2])for i in e] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re page_data = page_data.split('<div class="game">',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('<script>',1)[0] page_data = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)">([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace(' ','')) for i in page_data] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui,re pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') w = re.findall('(?:source|src|file):\s*[\'"]([^\'"]+)', page_data)[0] w = w.replace('master_desktop_complete','5600K/5600_slide') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return w + '|User-Agent=At Bat/26884 CFNetwork/894 Darwin/17.4.0&Authorization=' + token

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return u = client.request('http://markkystreams.com/mlb-streams/') u = u.split('<div class="container airkit-archive-content">',1)[-1] r = re.findall('(?s)<figure class="image-.*?href="([^"]*).*?title="([^"]*)', u) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace('&','').replace('#','').replace('8211','').replace(';','')) for i in r] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re r = page_data.split('class="embed-responsive-item">', 1)[-1] e = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)"(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',r) e =[(i[0],i[1]) for i in e if 'http://markkystreams.com/video/mlb' in i[0]] return e

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.replays('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65, 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]MLB LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (7S)[/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re r = re.findall('(?s)title = "([^"]*)(?:.*?f = ")([^"]*).*?datetime="([^"]*)', page_data) r = [(i[0],'http://www.720pstream.se'+i[1],i[2]) for i in r] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re e = re.findall('<a class="btn btn-primary btn-xs m-1" href="([^"]*)">([^<]*)',page_data) e = [('http://hdtv.720pstream.me'+i[0],i[1]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') r = re.findall('"videoUrl":"([^"]*)', page_data)[0] r = r.replace('\\','') r = r.replace('master_desktop_complete','5600K/5600_complete') return r + '|User-Agent=At Bat/26884 CFNetwork/894 Darwin/17.4.0&Authorization=' + token

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]MLB LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (PS)[/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return u = client.request('http://playoffsstream.com/reddit-mlb-streams') r = re.findall('(?s)block" title="([^"]*)(?:.*?f=")([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', u) r = [(i[0],'http://playoffsstream.com'+i[1],i[2]) for i in r if 'vs' in i[0]] return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re e = re.findall('href=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)',page_data) e = [('http://playoffsstream.live'+i[0],i[1]) for i in e] return e

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') r = re.findall('(?s)= "https:\/\/([^"]*)', page_data)[0] r = r.replace('hlslive','https://hlslive') r = r.replace('master_desktop_complete','5600K/5600_complete') return r + '|User-Agent=At Bat/26884 CFNetwork/894 Darwin/17.4.0&Authorization=' + token

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]MLB LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (FS)[/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)elementor-text-editor elementor(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:.*?href=")([^"]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re s = re.findall('<iframe.*?src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] s = s.replace('https://href.li/?','') token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') u = client.request(s) r = re.findall('var sou = "([^"]*)', u)[0] r = r.replace('master_desktop_complete','5600K/5600_complete') return r + '|User-Agent=At Bat/26884 CFNetwork/894 Darwin/17.4.0&Authorization=' + token

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]MLB LIVE[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (S24)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return site = client.request('https://sports24.stream/mlb//') items = re.findall('(?s)float: right;">([^<]*)(?:.*?href)="([^"]*)', site) sort = [(i[0].replace('\xc3\xa9s',''),'https://sports24.stream'+i[1].replace('\xc3\xa9s','')) for i in items] return sort

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,base64 s = client.request('[makelist.param2]') token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') u = re.findall('(?s)id="playframe">(?:.*?src)="([^"]*)', s)[0] b = 'https://sports24.stream'+u b = b.replace(' ', '%20') x = client.request(b) l = re.findall('(?s)xurl\s=\satob\(\'([^\']*)', x)[0]; l = base64.b64decode(l).decode('utf-8') l = l.replace('https:','') l = l.replace('//','https://') l = l.replace('master_desktop_complete','3500K/3500_slide') return l + '|Cookie=Authorization=' + token

regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): import re e = re.findall('(?s)
(?:.*?location=.*?)\'([^\']*)(?:.*?src.*?)="([^"]*)(?:.*?

.*?){2}([^<]*)', page_data) return e

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re x = re.findall('id="VideoFrame">\s (?:.*?src=)"([^"]*)', page_data)[0] token = client.request('http://team-crew.co.uk/Crew/dummyToken.txt') w = client.request(x) r = re.findall('source: \'([^\']*)', w)[0] r = r.replace('master_desktop_complete','5600K/5600_slide') return r + '|Cookie=Authorization=' + token

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = page_data.split('MLB Streams, Predictions & Previews',1)[-1] r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]+)".*?alt="([^"]*)Streams.*?vs2">([^<]*).*?alt="([^"]*)Streams', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re r = re.findall('(?s)srvrs rfstss1" >([^<]*).*?a href="([^"]*)', page_data) s = re.findall('(?s)chlst rfstss1" >([^<]*).*?src = "([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1].replace('game','iframes/d')) for i in r] sort1 = [(i[0],i[1]) for i in s] return sort + sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.replays('[lists.param2]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url
